events.message: I received my order yesterday but I want to request a refund because the item is not as described on the website.
The customer has requested a refund due to the product not matching the description provided online.
Assigning the refund case to a customer service agent experienced in handling refund requests.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us regarding your order. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so we can proceed with your request?
Sure, my order number is 1234567890. The item’s color is completely different from what was shown on the product page.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method. Please allow 5-7 business days for the amount to reflect.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the help and look forward to the refund being processed soon.
The refund has been successfully processed. If you need any further assistance, please don’t hesitate to reach out.
We are checking in to confirm that your refund was received. Please let us know if you have any other questions or concerns.
We have closed your case as the refund process was completed satisfactorily. Thank you for contacting our support team.
